title: Rational design and computational evaluation of a multi-epitope vaccine for monkeypox virus: Insights into binding stability and immunological memory
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Anupamjeet Kaur, Amit Kumar, Geetika Kumari, Rasmiranjan Muduli, Mayami Das, Rakesh Kundu, Suprabhat Mukherjee, Tanmay Majumdar
